attributes.action: Debate Boris Johnson's role in the conversion of the London/Olympic Stadium.
attributes.background:
https://www.london.gov.uk/press-releases/mayoral/stadium-forecast-to-lose-24-million-in-2017-18

The official review carried about by Moore Stephens on behalf of the current Mayor of London and the GLA clearly states there is a case to answer over the handling of this issue.

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

The London Stadium is the responsibility of the London Assembly, not the UK Government or Parliament. 

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
